@nassyweazy @soulmachine @blocknative For obscure addresses, Delivery Priority generally will not be a factor. But for popular addresses â€“ like PancakeSwap â€“ this can be a big factor.

@nassyweazy @soulmachine @blocknative Second â€œit depends.â€ As in, it depends on which address(es) are being monitored. @blocknative plans are ranked by Delivery Priority. As in, if two accounts are listening for events on the same smart contract, the queuing system sorts outbound API events by Delivery Priority.

@nassyweazy @soulmachine @blocknative â€œIt depends.â€ First, the @blocknative API events delivered to free Prototype accounts are subject to up to 2,000ms additional latency. FREE BLOCKNATIVE = SLOW BLOCKNATIVE. We need to make this explicitly in the payloads themselves. Details on this here. https://t.co/IsPj0vbCQG
